title: Store wont let me buy bundle
body: It just sits there and nothing happens

replies.body:
Hey Master Anubis,

We're experiencing high traffic with the store, and we're working to get everything back up and running ASAP!
Someone just asked me this and I'm not sure. When the skins go on sale next week without border, will the bundle still be available??
The bundle is only in the store until the 15th. It will not be available the second week.

> [{quoted}](name=Gin Gomi,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Qnq8oUgd,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-09-09T02:34:55.396+0000)
>
> Someone just asked me this and I'm not sure. When the skins go on sale next week without border, will the bundle still be available??

ya they are avable till the 15th its called the 1st strike
.........**facepalm**....... I'm asking if bundle will still be available on 2nd strike week.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Qnq8oUgd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-09T00:53:37.069+0000)
>
> Hey Master Anubis,
> 
> We're experiencing high traffic with the store, and we're working to get everything back up and running ASAP!

And what a wonderful job you guys did i bought the whole pack and all the icons cause i'm a lamo :D
Same with me, it says to just wait so i'll try again later
